h2_title: Elder Amourworm Boss Fight and Guide
content: When the Amourworm is defeated, you'll gain a Proto-Amourworm Key Item. It may seem mysterious, but it does have a use. Bring it to Chen Loong at the Zodiac Village, and then return later to find the tiny Amourworm in a little basket outside his shack. You'll need to feed the Proto-Amourworm three Rice Cocoons, which are randomly found by breaking apart small cocoons in the Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Amourworm.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Amourworm', specifically from the subsection 'Elder Amourworm Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When the Amourworm is defeated, you'll gain a Proto-Amourworm Key Item. It may seem mysterious, but it does have a use. Bring it to Chen Loong at the Zodiac Village, and then return later to find the tiny Amourworm in a little basket outside his shack. You'll need to feed the Proto-Amourworm three Rice Cocoons, which are randomly found by breaking apart small cocoons in the Webbed Hollow.
